name: lambci
description: A continuous integration system built on AWS Lambda
author: Michael Hart <michael@soothbooth.com>

scripts.template: sed -E "s_CodeUri:.+\$_CodeUri: {Bucket: {'Fn::Sub': 'lambci-\${AWS::Region}'}, Key: fn/lambci-build-$(npm run -s v).zip}_" template.yaml > build/versioned.yaml
scripts.zip: rm -rf build/lambda.zip node_modules && npm ci --prod && zip -qyr build/lambda.zip . -x@.lambdaignore
scripts.package: npm run zip && sam package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket ${S3_BUCKET:-lambci} --s3-prefix ${S3_PREFIX:-package} --output-template-file build/packaged.yaml
scripts.deploy: npm run package && sam deploy --stack-name ${STACK:-lambci} --template-file build/packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.docker: npm run zip && rm -rf build/docker && unzip build/lambda.zip -d build/docker && docker-compose build
